function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Statistical uncertainty related to selection bias","Impact":"Inaccurate or biased results in the analysis of contagious disease propagation","Mitigation":"Use randomization techniques and control group sampling to minimize selection bias","Technologies":"Statistical analysis and machine learning algorithms for bias correction","People":"Research analysts, statisticians, and data scientists","Owner":"Research institutions and data analysis teams"},{"Description":"Lack of generalizability to other countries","Impact":"Inaccurate application of findings to different healthcare systems and social structures","Mitigation":"Conduct cross-country comparative studies and consider contextual factors","Technologies":"International data collection and comparative analysis tools","People":"Health policy experts and researchers","Owner":"Public health institutions and international research collaborations"}]}
